name: ContextCueSDK
summary: The Official ContextCue SDK is the easiest way to _ethically_ monetize your iOS application through ads
description:
ContextCue is a privacy-focused advertising network that allows advertisers 

and publishers to grow their business without tracking, collecting, or storing 

user data. Ethically earn revenue by easily integrating with ContextCue ads. 


To learn more or sign up for an account, go to https://contextcue.com.
